title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 303.4 - Applicability of board rules and regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 303.4 - Applicability of board rules and regulations

State Regulations

All provisions of the Workers' Compensation Law as well as
the rules and regulations of the Workers' Compensation Board with respect to
the rights, duties and obligations of employers, employees, health care
providers and insurance carriers are expressly made applicable to this Part, except to the extent that such rules and regulations are inconsistent with
subdivision 2 of section
20
of
the Workers' Compensation Law or rules and regulations promulgated pursuant
thereto. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
303.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
